I tried to order the Shinsengumi book from Romulus Hillsborough off 
Amazon and received (when I began to play my order) an April/May 
target shipping date. This caught me off guard as the book was 
technically supposed to have been released in the second half of 
January.

Have any of you tried to dialogue with Ridgeback Press to find out 
the situation?  Their website hasn't updated with anything regarding 
the upcoming release.

I find it rather puzzling... if anything, I would expect RP to have 
excerpts or something to prompt folks to order the book.

Thx.
S
